markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ancestor's Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2656) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix. You can cast 5th-level [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=4) as a primal innate spell once per day, but you take the form of a primeval strix, using the statistics for a bird form.
name: Ancestor's Transformation
